byline.contributor: Sophia Kishkovsky reported from Moscow and Roslyn Sulcas reported from Paris.
byline.original: By SOPHIA KISHKOVSKY and ROSLYN SULCAS

abstract: Bolshoi Theater says it will not renew contract of Sergei Filin, artistic director of Bolshoi Ballet injured in 2013 acid attack, after it expires in March 2016; Filin, whose sight was damaged, will continue in advisory capacity.
lead_paragraph: The theater’s general director said on its website on Thursday that Sergei Filin, the ballet’s artistic director, would not stay on after March.

headline.main: Bolshoi Is Not Renewing Acid Attack Victim’s Contract
headline.print_headline: Acid Attack Victim to Leave the Bolshoi

snippet: The theater’s general director said on its website on Thursday that Sergei Filin, the ballet’s artistic director, would not stay on after March.
